feed.title: Koel Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Koel: v7.0.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: display default cover when processing empty cover image by @PBK-B in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1815
  • feat: only show batch download options if supported by @phanan in b79bfb0472937910aa2432baa400839ec54b60f6
  • feat: add keyboard shortcut for Home screen by @phanan in ea02d1cca53d3af4645736370d5977c2c8750890
  • some cleaning up

New Contributors

  • @PBK-B made their first contribution in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1815

Full Changelog: https://github.com/koel/koel/compare/v7.0.11...v7.0.12

entry.title: New release for Koel: v7.1.0
entry.content:
• feat: use transcode-and-cache instead of direct on-the-fly transcode & streaming by @phanan in 6664e1d1eabcf15c499baa428c91bb0f2f81549e
  • feat: add koel:doctor artisan command by @phanan in f5861ad518bb500eeacee693d3b5274f0472e4a2
  • feat: allow upload on mobile by @phanan in 8257e740998ea8a03a17163301a80ad8a3327749
  • chore: always show user list controls by @phanan in 24ea957e9e0d98ee819c6d2e3ae24df7ad9f36c8
  • feat: allow choosing among various bitrate options for mobile transcoding by @phanan in c3e5e8ac5a7e9c8480f8684f40f1f5d94b638302
  • Other minor improvements and fixes

Full Changelog: https://github.com/koel/koel/compare/v7.0.12...v7.1.0

entry.title: New release for Koel: v7.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(build): upgrade actions/upload-artifact to v4 by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1832
  • feat: replace attempt() with built-in rescue() by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1833
  • feat(build): use action-gh-release instead of deprecated GH actions for release by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1834
  • chore: several improvements for PodcastService by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1836
  • chore: cache model attributes by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1839
  • fix: ensure default storage is local by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1840
  • feat(dev): use concurrently to start dev servers by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1849
  • feat: use a better ESLint setup by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1850
  • chore: use some better icons by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1851
  • feat: implement disc numbers when viewing an album by @ShetlandJ in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1845
  • chore: better Repository docs by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1852
  • refactor: rename ExtraDrawer to SideSheet by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1853
  • fix: sort by disc/track not working if only one disc by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1854
  • refactor: remove barrel files by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1855
  • feat: allow toggling song list columns by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1857
  • refactor: use attributes for tests by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1858
  • fix: broken artisan route:list command by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1859
  • fix: artist/album screen loading state by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1860
  • feat: add loading state for async components by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1861
  • fix: loading state for Playlist screen by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1862
  • feat: add and use a URL helper for router by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1863
  • fix: song controls disappear during filtering by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1864
  • fix: some song lists' filtering was broken by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1865
  • chore: use defineAsyncComponent() helper for more components by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1868
  • feat: always show song list header action menu by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1869
  • fix: options to mark songs as private/public shown in Community edition by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1870

New Contributors

  • @ShetlandJ made their first contribution in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1845

Full Changelog: https://github.com/koel/koel/compare/v7.1.0...v7.2.0

entry.title: New release for Koel: v7.2.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(editing songs): track number removed when editing multiple songs by @ShetlandJ in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1842
  • chore(config): update comment for Spotify integration by @ziko1153 in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1867
  • feat: use PHP attribute to mark requests disabled in demo by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1873
  • build(deps): bump symfony/http-foundation from 6.4.4 to 6.4.14 by @dependabot in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1872
  • build(deps): bump symfony/process from 6.4.4 to 6.4.14 by @dependabot in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1871
  • refactor: avoid leadking database keys by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1874
  • fix:koel:doctor – check DB connection before media storage by @phanan in d2606414b7ea29f4fd7eace20dc1269717e6546a
  • chore: koel:doctor – check if storage type is local or S3lamda before checking for Koel Plus license by @phanan in 47173d92e49f5d5b6fdf463863b89d75ff65b3cb
  • fix: (Koel Plus) shared playlists not showing at root level by @phanan in e85c42eb32b4425c9b6b90ecdda0e80ed600f0cc
  • fix: one playlist can be added into multiple folders by @phanan in 95ceb1bb11991c8debeb69f032ca11c1b6ab1dae
  • fix: wrong cache key normalization by @phanan in 1e1fed5fdad860afb19247c2d00c1a28fd28677a

New Contributors

  • @ziko1153 made their first contribution in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1867

Full Changelog: https://github.com/koel/koel/compare/v7.2.0...v7.2.1

entry.title: New release for Koel: v7.2.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: group by issue in Postgres (closes #1907) by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1908
  • fix: various broken tests by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1909
  • feat: add Butterchurn visualizer by @kran27 in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1892

New Contributors

  • @kran27 made their first contribution in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1892

Full Changelog: https://github.com/koel/koel/compare/v7.2.1...v7.2.2
